meanings.definition: A mask used in photolithography to transfer patterns onto a substrate.
meanings.sent1: The photomask helped create intricate designs on the computer chip.
meanings.sent2: The technician carefully aligned the photomask on top of the silicon wafer.
meanings.sent3: When the photomask went missing, the patterns on the substrate turned into a jumbled mess.
meanings.sent4: The photomask acted like a secret code, revealing the hidden pattern on the substrate.
meanings.sent5: Under the bright light, the photomask revealed its detailed design on the substrate.

meanings.definition: A tool used in the production of integrated circuits to define the pattern of each layer.
meanings.sent1: The photomask played a crucial role in shaping the layers of the integrated circuit.
meanings.sent2: Engineers rely on the precision of the photomask to ensure accurate patterns on each layer.
meanings.sent3: During the circuit production, the photomask accidentally slipped, creating a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: Like a master artist, the photomask carefully painted the intricate layers of the circuit.
meanings.sent5: The photomask's role was akin to a conductor, orchestrating the pattern symphony of the integrated circuit.
